column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////We came the day after New Years at around 8 am and it wasn't full at all
column2: but on the weekends the wait can be upwards of half an hour. I'd say it's worth it if you're looking for a reliably good late breakfast
column3: especially since so many other similar restaurants are seriously overrated and overhyped. Wildberry is on the spot.
